param.name: PackageVCS_DefaultBranch
param.spec: text display='normal' description='Default branch of the git repository' label='Default branch' validationMode='not_empty'

param.name: PackageVCS_URL
param.spec: text display='normal' description='Git URL managing the package' label='Repository URL' validationMode='not_empty'

param.name: system.recipeLayer
param.spec: text display='normal' description='The bitbake layer location' label='Recipe layer' validationMode='not_empty'

param.name: system.recipeName
param.spec: text display='normal' description='The name of the recipe in bitbake' label='Package name' validationMode='not_empty'
